title: EWC - EU Company Certificate
description: Schema for EU Company Certificate -  EWC WP3

issuing_authority.description: Name of issuer from the MS that issued the credential

issuing_authority_id.description: EUID of the issuing authority. (Business register identifier for BRIS)

issuing_country.description: Alpha-2 country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1, of the issuing country or territory.

issuing_jurisdiction.description: As defined in ISO 3166-2:2020, of the issuing country or territory.

issuance_date.description: Date and possibly time of issuance

expiry_date.description: Date and possibly time of credential expiration

authentic_source_id.description: LPID Id of the issuing authority. (Business register identifier for BRIS)

authentic_source_name.description: Name of issuer from the MS that issued the credential

legalName.description: Legal person official name as in LPID

legalIdentifier.description: National registration number of the company

registrationMemberState.description: Member State where the company is registered, Alpha-2 country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1

registeredAddress.description: Registered office of the company (full address or part of it)

careOf.title: Care Of
careOf.description: Used when an address is at the address of another person or legal entity.

fullAddress.title: Full Address
fullAddress.description: The complete address written as a string, separated with ";".

thoroughfare.title: Thoroughfare
thoroughfare.description: The name of a passage or way through from one location to another.

locatorDesignator.title: Locator Designator
locatorDesignator.description: A number or a sequence of characters that uniquely identifies the locator within the relevant scope.

postCode.title: Post Code
postCode.description: The code created and maintained for postal purposes to identify a subdivision of addresses and postal delivery points.

postName.title: Post Name
postName.description: A name created and maintained for postal purposes to identify a subdivision of addresses and postal delivery points.

postOfficeBox.title: Post Office Box
postOfficeBox.description: A location designator for a postal delivery point at a post office, usually a number.

locatorName.title: Locator Name
locatorName.description: Proper noun(s) applied to the real world entity identified by the locator. The locator name could be the name of the property or complex, of the building or part of the building, or it could be the name of a room inside a building.

adminUnitLevel1.title: Admin Unit Level 1
adminUnitLevel1.description: The uppermost administrative unit for the address, almost always a country.

adminUnitLevel2.title: Admin Unit Level 2
adminUnitLevel2.description: The name of a secondary level/region of the address, usually a county, state or other such area that typically encompasses several localities.

registrationDate.description: Date of registration of the company

shareCapital.description: Amount of the capital subscribed with currency

legalEntityStatus.description: Status of the company as defined in national law and where recorded in the national register

legalEntityActivity.description: Object of the company describing its main activity or activities, which must be expressed using the Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community (NACE)

description.description: Short description of the legal entity activity

legalEntityDuration.description: Duration of the company, where its duration is limited

contactPoint.description: Correspondence address of the company, such as electronic mail or postal address (full or partial)

legalRepresentative.description: Information about any person authorized by the company to represent it alone or jointly

credentialStatus.description: Defines suspension and/or revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by the type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credentialSchema.description: One or more schemas that validate the Verifiable Credential.
Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based on

legalRepresentative.physicalPerson.description: Details about the representative of the company if incarnated by a physical person

fullName.description: Full name of the physical person representing the company

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the physical person representing the company

signatoryRule.description: Information if the representative can engage the company alone or jointly

legalRepresentative.legalPerson.description: Details about the representative of the company if incarnated by a legal person

legalName.description: Registered name of the legal person representing the company

legalFormType.description: Form type of the legal person representing the company

identifier.description: EUID of the legal person representing the company
